value.string:
# XXX For now, this script requires proxy manager
 
 # base_category_list : list of category values we need to retrieve
 # user_name : string obtained from getSecurityManager().getUser().getUserName() [NuxUserGroup]
 # or from getSecurityManager().getUser().getId() [PluggableAuthService with ERP5GroupManager]
 # object : object which we want to assign roles to.
 # portal_type : portal type of object
 
 # must always return a list of dicts
 
 from Products.ZSQLCatalog.SQLCatalog import Query, ComplexQuery
 category_list = []
 
 if obj is None:
 return []
 
 portal = obj.getPortalObject()
 
 state_list = portal.getPortalCurrentInventoryStateList() + \
 portal.getPortalReservedInventoryStateList() + \
 portal.getPortalTransitInventoryStateList()
 
 resource_list = [portal.portal_preferences.getPreferredInstanceSetupResource(),
 portal.portal_preferences.getPreferredInstanceHostingResource()]
 
 sale_packing_list_line = portal.portal_catalog.getResultValue(
 resource_relative_url=resource_list,
 aggregate_uid=obj.getUid(),
 portal_type="Sale Packing List Line",
 simulation_state=state_list)
 
 if sale_packing_list_line is None:
 return []
 
 computer_partition = sale_packing_list_line.getAggregateValue(
 portal_type="Computer Partition")
 software_release = sale_packing_list_line.getAggregateValue(
 portal_type="Software Release")
 
 catalog_result = portal.portal_catalog(portal_type="Sale Packing List Line",
 aggregate_portal_type="Slave Instance",
 simulation_state=state_list,
 limit=1,
 default_aggregate_uid=[computer_partition.getUid(), software_release.getUid(), obj.getuid()]
 )
 
 if len(catalog_result) == 0:
 return catalog_result
 
 packing_list_line = portal.portal_catalog.getResultValue(
 portal_type="Sale Packing List Line",
 aggregate_portal_type="Software Instance",
 simulation_state=state_list,
 default_aggregate_uid=[computer_partition.getUid(), software_release.getUid()])
 
 if packing_list_line is not None:
 software_instance = packing_list_line.getAggregateValue(
 portal_type="Software Instance")
 return {"Auditor": [software_instance.getReference(),]}
 
 return category_list
